text: “Nɨ uan Arazibar Akɨnafarimɨn aven akabar gɨn mangasa nɨ me mɨgei. Me fo, gumazitam dar gɨn mangɨ, tuavir kamɨn a ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuim iniam. Ezɨ me uari fa nɨn Akar Gavgaviba barazi puvatɨgha, akɨrim nɨn Arazir nɨ damuasa mɨkemezibagh asaragha, arazir kurabagh ami. Men dapaniba gavgavizɨ me uan navibar kumi, kamaghɨn me nɨn akamɨn gɨn mangan aghua.
